Sentencas: The mathematical simulation of a planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is presented.
Titulo: 3-DIMENSIONAL AND TIME-DEPENDENT SIMULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL STACK

Sentencas: The model accounts for three-dimensional and time-dependent effects.
Titulo: 3-DIMENSIONAL AND TIME-DEPENDENT SIMULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL STACK

Sentencas: Internal methane-steam reforming and recycling of the anode gas are also considered.
Titulo: 3-DIMENSIONAL AND TIME-DEPENDENT SIMULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL STACK

Sentencas: The effects of different flow manifolding, i.e., cross-, co-, or counter-flow are discussed.
Titulo: 3-DIMENSIONAL AND TIME-DEPENDENT SIMULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL STACK

Sentencas: After a short description of the mathematical procedure, computational results are presented.
Titulo: 3-DIMENSIONAL AND TIME-DEPENDENT SIMULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL STACK

Sentencas: In particular the distribution of the gases, of the current density and of the solid structure temperature across the cell are shown.
Titulo: 3-DIMENSIONAL AND TIME-DEPENDENT SIMULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL STACK

Sentencas: Furthermore the effects of different flow manifolding, of radiation from the outer stack surface to the surroundings and of anode gas recycling on the operating conditions of the stack are considered.
Titulo: 3-DIMENSIONAL AND TIME-DEPENDENT SIMULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL STACK

Sentencas: The response of the cell voltage to a load change is also discussed.
Titulo: 3-DIMENSIONAL AND TIME-DEPENDENT SIMULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL STACK
